title: Ouvrir la Porte
lyrics: Instrumental

title: The Other Side (of Me)
lyrics: The final hammer will fall on my destiny My fate will call when the sun goes down The cold wind blows hard into my sanity The beating of my heart rumbles the solid ground Ah ... I can't resist this trembling inside This alter ego coming out, I cannot hide The other side of me will rise ... Marching out, my unholiness inside ... Only seeing Black and red There's a million thoughts going through my head My path is chosen break the shell I will go my way whether it's heaven or Hell Ah ... I can't control this wild fever in me The beast inside will show for the whole world to see The other side of me will rise ... Marching out, my unholiness inside ... The evil side of me will rise ... Crushing down, all the enemies aside ... spoken: For all you nay - sayers out there Open your eyes, behold and beware My wrath shall run all over thee My rage and your fear is what I need Ah ... I can't control this wild fever in me The beast inside will show for the whole world to see The other side of me will rise ... Marching out, my unholiness inside ... The evil side of me will rise ... Crushing down, all the enemies aside ... The other side of me will rise ... Marching out, my unholiness inside ... The evil side of me will rise ... Crushing down, all the enemies aside ...
